OrgSnapshot.name: OrgSnapshot
OrgSnapshot.description: Represents a snapshot of a scratch org. Snapshots capture the state of a scratch org so that you can use it to quickly spin up new scratch orgs using its configuration.

Description.description: A free-form text field (maximum 255 characters) for you to enter a description of this scratch org snapshot.

ExpirationDate.description: Date when the scratch org snapshot expires.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate isnâ€™t null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns the scratch org snapshot.

SnapshotName.description: The name of the scratch org snapshot. This field value is unique within your org.

SourceOrg.description: The org ID of the scratch org that the snapshot was created from.
